Introduction
This topic discusses how to treat the additional benefits VA pays to beneficiaries for their dependents and benefits VA pays to apportionees when calculating VA income for SSA purposes, including
exclusions from the calculation of VA income for SSA purposes
, and
completing Part II, Section D, of
SSA Form L1103
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Requests for the Amount of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefits Received
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
